EmailTemplate.name: CR - Project is live - additionl share
EmailTemplate.subject: Your additional Community Solar share is now live!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Life just got a little sunnier.
Congrats on your additional Community Solar Share!
Solar credits from your additional share are now flowing to your electric account! Keep your eyes out for these credits on your upcoming utility bills.
Community Solar FAQs
Please reach out if you have any questions about your new Community Solar Share.
- Thanks from all of us here at BlueWave
